summary: Completed testing of P0 SEO Change Intelligence Layer. All 16 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified all change_note fields present in Add/Edit/Delete dialogs with proper styling and button disabled states.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent}. - Minor accessibility issue

backend: Structure Create without change_note returns 422 (Pydantic validation)
Structure Create with short change_note (<3 chars) returns 422
Structure Delete with change_note in body succeeds
SEO Telegram settings require authentication (401 without token)
frontend: Add Node dialog shows Change Note field with amber highlight
Edit Node dialog shows Change Note field with amber highlight
Delete Node dialog shows 'Reason for Deletion' field with red highlight
Save button disabled when change_note is empty in Edit dialog
Delete button disabled when change_note is empty in Delete dialog
Add Node button disabled when change_note is empty
data-testid attributes present: add-node-change-note, edit-change-note, delete-change-note

critical_code_review_comments: Backend properly validates change_note with Pydantic Field(min_length=3, max_length=500)
SEO change logs stored in separate 'seo_change_logs' collection from system logs
Notifications automatically created for important events (node deletion, role change, target relink)
SEO Telegram channel uses fallback to main channel if not configured (by design)
Team metrics API properly aggregates by user, network, and most modified nodes

bug_fixes_applied.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in change-history endpoint
bug_fixes_applied.fix: Added _clean_snapshot() method to remove _id from before_snapshot and after_snapshot dicts before storing

seed_data_creation: Test entries created during testing were cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 SEO Change Intelligence Layer fully implemented and tested. Key features: 1) Structure CRUD requires mandatory change_note field (validated by Pydantic), 2) Change logs stored in seo_change_logs collection separate from activity_logs_v3, 3) Network notifications auto-generated for important events, 4) Team metrics API at /api/v3/change-logs/stats, 5) SEO Telegram settings separate from monitoring at /api/v3/settings/telegram-seo. Frontend dialogs all have amber-highlighted Change Note fields with disabled buttons until note is provided.
